sentence.text: Since the original description of the tRNA aminoacylation for protein translation-related cataracts, growth hormone deficiency, sensory neuropathy, sensorineural hearing loss, skeletal dysplasia syndrome (CAGSSS; OMIM 616007) in an extended consanguineous family of French-Canadian descent, no further patients have been reported.

We present her clinical features and particularly highlight her skeletal findings, which confirm the presence of a primary regulation of axon extension involved in axon guidance skeletal dysplasia in a growing list of mitochondrial-related disorders including CAGSSS, CODAS, EVEN-PLUS, and X-linked SEMD-MR syndromes

entity.text: regulation of axon extension involved in axon guidance
